            and your life? That put you on The Path to resilience and success.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            What story do you want to make about your life? Choose your own life story – to enhance resilience and
            success (Pillars #5 & 9)
step_of_the_day.quote: "Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale." - Hans Christian Andersen
step_of_the_day.content:
Does Hans Christian Andersen know something you don’t? Is this fact hiding in plain sight? Or is this too
            big a jump for you? Have you developed too much pain and bitterness to make this leap – or to a lesser
            degree, frustration and disappointment? Remember, your story is initiated by others and is placed upon you.
            Of course, this sets you in a direction that has consequences. These consequences include any wounding, loss
            and disappointments.But it’s never too late to take control of your story and thus your life. Buddha said that suffering is
            “pain + resistance\". The story you hold about you and your life impacts your beliefs and your decisions. If
            you can begin to design your own story about yourself, it will send you in a more positive and successful –
            and resilient future. (Notice, also, that I repeated yesterday’ quote above as an indication of how
            important I believe it is.)

action_step:
Create the most positive version of a story about yourself. Reframe, reevaluate your life to give yourself
            support and an accepting and caring perspective. Then, determine how this new perspective can help you
            moving forward.
journal_entry: Write about your new and more positive and accepting story about yourself and your life.
